subtitle: Serve this with a freshly cooked green vegetable.

method.text: In a frying pan, melt one third of the butter with the oil. Add onions, cover and cook for 15-20 min, stirring occasionally, until golden brown. Stir in the cumin seeds and cook for 1 min.

Arrange 9 pastry sheets in a 25 cm loose bottomed flan tin, so that about one third of each sheet is left hanging over the edge. Melt the remaining butter and brush the pastry sheets with a little of the butter.
Sprinkle semolina over the base. Top with the tomatoes, bacon and cooked onions.

Bring the pastry up and arrange in loose folds over the filling. Arrange the remaining sheets on top in loose folds to completely cover the filling, brushing with butter while folding the pastry. Bake for 25-30 min.

title: Crispy bacon filo pie
